keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: PARIS HEARS TARDILY OF WAR ON GREECE; Confidence in an Italian Victory Is Voiced by Press

lead_paragraph: PARIS, Oct. 29 (Delayed; Via Berlin)--Confidence that with Italian aid the Albanians will be able to defeat the Greeks is expressed by the afternoon issue of the Paris-Soir, the first paper to announce to Parisians in so many words that there is a war between Italy and Greece.
